tasks.task_description: Enhance fast-agent service with quality optimization parameters
Add multi-threaded reflection and iterative improvement system
Implement advanced UX loading states with dynamic messaging
Create parameter optimization framework for task-specific tuning
Add multimodal response handling and streaming enhancements
Implement step-by-step processing for complex tasks
Add quality assessment and feedback mechanisms

description: Enhance fast-agent integration with quality-focused optimizations, advanced processing capabilities, and improved UX for handling complex multimodal responses and iterative improvements
context: Enhanced fast-agent service with quality optimization parameters, complexity detection, adaptive processing, and iterative improvement capabilities. Added comprehensive configuration options for quality settings and processing modes.

Created multi-threaded reflection engine with parallel processing capabilities, multiple perspective analysis (technical accuracy, clarity, practical implementation), and quality synthesis. Includes configurable thresholds and timeout handling.

Created advanced UX loading states manager with dynamic messaging, contextual message pools, progress tracking, and estimated duration calculations. Supports message rotation and streaming state updates for better user experience during long processing tasks.

Created comprehensive parameter optimization framework with task-specific profiles, performance learning, and adaptive parameter tuning. Includes profiles for code generation, file operations, analysis, creative content, and workflow orchestration with automatic parameter adjustment based on context and performance feedback.

Enhanced fast-agent interceptor with multimodal response handling, intelligent content streaming, parameter optimization integration, and advanced loading states. Added support for step-by-step processing, reflection results, and context-aware chunking strategies.

Enhanced fast-agent interceptor with multimodal response handling, intelligent content streaming, parameter optimization integration, and advanced loading states. Added support for step-by-step processing, reflection results, and context-aware chunking strategies.

Enhanced fast-agent interceptor with multimodal response handling, intelligent content streaming, parameter optimization integration, and advanced loading states. Added support for step-by-step processing, reflection results, and context-aware chunking strategies.
